description:
This two-person collapsible cookset is great for saving space in your pack while maintaining functionality. The kettle has a durable and efficient aluminum base and is great for cooking water-based meals. The mugs and bowls double as measuring cups and cutting boards. When you're done your meal, the mugs, bowls and kettle collapse down and nest together to leave you plenty of room in your pack.

  • Food-grade silicone doesn’t transfer taste, resists high heat, and is easy to clean
  • Kettle has hard-anodized T6 aluminum base that transfers heat efficiently and resists sticking
  • Nylon ring on mugs gives structure for easy drinking
  • Nylon base on bowls is great for chopping food
  • Mugs and bowls are microwave and dishwasher safe. Kettle is not
  • Set includes 2.2L kettle, kettle lid, 2 bowls and 2 mugs
  • Mugs, bowls and kettle nest together with collapsed dimension of 19.5 x 4.5cm
name: Sea To Summit X-Set 12 Cookset 5-Piece
